activities.name: Visit the Sforza Castle Gardens
activities.description: Explore the beautifully landscaped gardens surrounding the historic Sforza Castle, which come to life with colorful spring blooms.
activities.seasonal_notes: The gardens are particularly vibrant in spring, with flowers in full bloom providing a picturesque setting.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required, but check the weather ahead to enjoy a sunny day.

activities.name: Milan Design Week
activities.description: An internationally renowned event showcasing new trends in design, with exhibitions and installations spread throughout the city.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held every April, this event is a highlight of spring in Milan, attracting designers and enthusiasts from around the world.
activities.booking_tips: Plan your visit around major installations; some events may require prior registration.

activities.name: Navigli Canals Boat Tour
activities.description: Discover the charming Navigli district with a boat tour along the historic canals, ideal in spring when the weather is mild.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring offers pleasant temperatures for enjoying the canals without the summer crowds.
activities.booking_tips: Book your tickets online in advance, especially on weekends.

activities.name: Brera Art Gallery
activities.description: Explore one of Italy's most important art collections, featuring masterpieces from the Italian Renaissance.
activities.seasonal_notes: Ideal on a rainy spring day, providing a cultural escape within a historic setting.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online to skip the line and consider a guided tour for deeper insights.

activities.name: Visit to the Duomo di Milano
activities.description: No visit to Milan is complete without seeing the iconic Duomo, with its stunning gothic architecture.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring mornings offer cooler temperatures and fewer crowds, perfect for exploring the cathedral.
activities.booking_tips: Arrive early to avoid long lines, especially on weekends.

activities.name: Parco Sempione Picnic
activities.description: Enjoy a leisurely picnic in Parco Sempione, Milan's central park, surrounded by lush greenery and historic monuments.
activities.seasonal_notes: The park is at its best in spring, with mild weather and blossoming trees.
activities.booking_tips: Bring your own snacks or buy from local vendors; no reservations needed.

activities.name: La Scala Opera House Tour
activities.description: Take a guided tour of the world-famous La Scala Opera House, an architectural and cultural treasure of Milan.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring is a great time to explore cultural venues, avoiding the peak tourist season.
activities.booking_tips: Book tours in advance, especially during busy periods like weekends and holidays.

activities.name: Street Art Tour in Isola
activities.description: Explore the vibrant street art scene in the trendy Isola district, with colorful murals and installations.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring's mild weather is perfect for walking tours, allowing you to comfortably explore the district.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required, but consider a guided tour for detailed insights.

activities.name: Attend a Concert at Teatro Dal Verme
activities.description: Experience a classical music concert at the historic Teatro Dal Verme, known for its excellent acoustics.
activities.seasonal_notes: Spring evenings are ideal for indoor cultural events, with a variety of performances available.
activities.booking_tips: Check the concert schedule online and book tickets early for popular performances.

activities.name: Open Air Cinema at Arianteo
activities.description: Watch classic and contemporary films under the stars at Arianteo, Milan's open-air cinema.
activities.seasonal_notes: A popular summer activity, offering a unique cinematic experience in a warm, outdoor setting.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets can be purchased online or at the venue; arrive early for the best seats.

activities.name: Aperitivo at Navigli
activities.description: Enjoy a traditional Milanese aperitivo along the picturesque canals of the Navigli district.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer evenings are perfect for enjoying drinks al fresco, with many bars offering outdoor seating.
activities.booking_tips: No reservation needed, but popular spots can fill up quickly after work hours.

activities.name: Day Trip to Lake Como
activities.description: Take a scenic day trip to Lake Como, renowned for its stunning landscapes and charming villages.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer is ideal for exploring Lake Como, with warm weather and plenty of water activities.
activities.booking_tips: Book train tickets in advance and plan your itinerary to make the most of your day.

activities.name: Explore the Brera District
activities.description: Wander through the artistic Brera district, known for its galleries, boutiques, and vibrant atmosphere.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer afternoons are perfect for leisurely strolls, with longer daylight hours to explore.
activities.booking_tips: No booking needed; wear comfortable shoes for walking.

activities.name: Attend Milano Latin Festival
activities.description: Experience the lively Milano Latin Festival, celebrating Latin American culture with music, dance, and food.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held annually in summer, this festival offers vibrant cultural experiences under the open sky.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets can be purchased online; check the schedule for specific events and performances.

activities.name: Climb to the Duomo Rooftop
activities.description: Climb to the rooftop of the Duomo for panoramic views of Milan and beyond, best enjoyed in clear summer weather.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer provides clear skies for the best views, though it can get hot later in the day.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online to save time and aim for an early morning visit to avoid the heat.

activities.name: Attend a Fashion Show
activities.description: Attend fashion shows during Milan's Fashion Week, a highlight of the city's summer cultural calendar.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer fashion weeks draw international crowds, showcasing the latest trends in design.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets are highly sought after; book well in advance and check for public shows.

activities.name: Visit to the Leonardo da Vinci National Museum of Science and Technology
activities.description: Explore Italy's largest science and technology museum, featuring exhibits on Leonardo da Vinci's work.
activities.seasonal_notes: An ideal indoor activity for hot summer days, offering educational exhibitions.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets online to avoid queues, especially during weekends.

activities.name: Parco delle Cave
activities.description: Visit Parco delle Cave, a large park on the outskirts of Milan, perfect for picnics and outdoor activities.
activities.seasonal_notes: Summer's warm weather is perfect for enjoying this expansive green space.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; bring sunscreen and plenty of water.

activities.name: Attend the Milan Film Festival
activities.description: Experience the Milan Film Festival, showcasing independent films from around the world.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held annually in autumn, the festival provides a platform for emerging filmmakers.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets in advance for screenings, particularly for popular films.

activities.name: Visit the Pinacoteca Ambrosiana
activities.description: Discover the art treasures housed in the Pinacoteca Ambrosiana, including works by Leonardo da Vinci.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is perfect for museum visits, offering a cultural retreat from cooler weather.
activities.booking_tips: Online booking is recommended to secure entry, especially on weekends.

activities.name: Explore the Chinatown District
activities.description: Wander through Milan's Chinatown, experiencing authentic cuisine and vibrant street life.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn's mild weather is ideal for exploring outdoor markets and sampling street food.
activities.booking_tips: No booking needed; visit during the afternoon for the liveliest atmosphere.

activities.name: Attend a Football Match at San Siro Stadium
activities.description: Cheer on AC Milan or Inter Milan at the iconic San Siro Stadium during an exciting football match.
activities.seasonal_notes: Football season kicks off in autumn, offering thrilling live sports experiences.
activities.booking_tips: Purchase tickets well in advance, as matches often sell out quickly.

activities.name: Visit the Fondazione Prada
activities.description: Explore contemporary art exhibitions at the Fondazione Prada, housed in a stunning architectural complex.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is a great time to enjoy indoor art exhibitions, with new installations often debuting.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets online to ensure entry, and check for special exhibitions.

activities.name: Attend the Oh Bej! Oh Bej! Fair
activities.description: Explore the traditional Christmas market held at the beginning of December, marking the start of the holiday season.
activities.seasonal_notes: The fair kicks off the festive season, offering unique gifts and traditional treats.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; dress warmly and prepare for large crowds.

activities.name: Take a Cooking Class
activities.description: Learn to make authentic Italian dishes with a hands-on cooking class in Milan.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn is perfect for culinary activities, with seasonal ingredients like mushrooms and truffles.
activities.booking_tips: Reserve your spot in advance, as classes can fill up quickly.

activities.name: Visit the Basilica di Sant'Ambrogio
activities.description: Explore one of Milan's oldest churches, a masterpiece of Romanesque architecture.
activities.seasonal_notes: Autumn provides a quieter time to appreciate the basilica's historic beauty.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required, but guided tours are available for deeper insights.

activities.name: Attend a Performance at Teatro alla Scala
activities.description: Experience world-class opera and ballet performances at Milan's premier opera house.
activities.seasonal_notes: The autumn season opens with new productions, attracting opera enthusiasts from around the globe.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets sell out fast; book as early as possible to secure your seats.

activities.name: Visit the Christmas Markets
activities.description: Explore the festive Christmas markets scattered around Milan, offering handmade gifts and traditional treats.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter markets are a highlight of the festive season, best enjoyed in the crisp evening air.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; dress warmly and try the local mulled wine.

activities.name: Ice Skating at Piazza Gae Aulenti
activities.description: Skate in the heart of Milan at the seasonal ice rink set up in Piazza Gae Aulenti.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is perfect for ice skating, with seasonal rinks offering fun for all ages.
activities.booking_tips: Skates can be rented on-site; arrive early to avoid crowds.

activities.name: Visit the Last Supper
activities.description: See Leonardo da Vinci's iconic fresco, The Last Supper, housed in the Convent of Santa Maria delle Grazie.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter is a quieter time to visit this masterpiece, as tourist numbers dwindle.
activities.booking_tips: Tickets are limited and must be booked well in advance.

activities.name: Attend La Scala's New Year Concert
activities.description: Celebrate the New Year with a special concert at the renowned La Scala opera house.
activities.seasonal_notes: A prestigious event, the New Year's concert is a cultural highlight of Milan's winter season.
activities.booking_tips: Book tickets as soon as they become available, as they sell out rapidly.

activities.name: Visit the Triennale di Milano
activities.description: Explore modern and contemporary art exhibitions at the Triennale, Milan's design and art museum.
activities.seasonal_notes: An ideal indoor activity for cold winter days, offering diverse exhibitions.
activities.booking_tips: Check the museum's website for current exhibitions and buy tickets online.

activities.name: Explore the Galleria Vittorio Emanuele II
activities.description: Shop and dine in one of the world's oldest shopping malls, a beautiful 19th-century glass-roofed arcade.
activities.seasonal_notes: The Galleria is particularly enchanting during the festive season, with elegant decorations.
activities.booking_tips: No booking needed; visit during weekdays to avoid the weekend shopping rush.

activities.name: Attend the Oh Bej! Oh Bej! Fair
activities.description: Experience this traditional market, held in early December, marking Milan's festive season.
activities.seasonal_notes: A beloved winter tradition, offering unique gifts and festive foods.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; expect large crowds, especially on weekends.

activities.name: Visit the Bagni Misteriosi
activities.description: Enjoy a day at the Bagni Misteriosi, where the pool area transforms into a winter wonderland with art installations.
activities.seasonal_notes: Winter brings a magical transformation to this popular summer spot.
activities.booking_tips: Check the schedule for events and installations; book tickets online for special events.

activities.name: Attend the Artigiano in Fiera
activities.description: Shop for unique artisan products from around the world at this massive international fair.
activities.seasonal_notes: Held in early December, this fair is a prime spot for holiday shopping and discovering global crafts.
activities.booking_tips: No booking required; plan your visit during weekdays to avoid the busiest times.
